context: Hi! How are you today? It is nice to meet you. Do you need help finding a movie?
Hello Yes do you have any drama reccomendations? What types of movies do you like?
Sure, I love dramas. What is your favorite drama? I like comedies, but I love all kinds of movies.
I really like The Shawshank Redemption (1994) Have you seen Thor: Ragnarok (2017) it was a superhero movie but very funny.
resp: I haven't seen Thor: Ragnarok (2017) . Have you seen Me Before You ? It is a drama, but it has some romance in it too.
